Writing

I do not write as well or as often as I would like. Nonetheless, I have put some things here for the readers' perusal. If you're taking the time to read them, I sincerely hope you enjoy.

  • Graduating: I received a graduate degree in December 2021 and wrote about it
  • Pensee: In 2020, I curated a Cognitive Science newsletter with a friend. The venture did not last very long, but when I look back at it, I am impressed with the editions we put out.
